::KitKat::

She got up and walked over to Scorponok.
"Yeah, I'll go."



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, crow_lord@h... wrote:
> 
Scorponok/Sniper/Zergling/Oinker/BH/BlastRage/Proto/Grimmler/Rhinox/Lo
> bstruck
> 
> 
>   Scopronok walks back into the base. "Good, you got QuickStrike
> back. 
> When he heals I want everybody to meet in the command room." 
>   With this Scorponok went to his lab. He saw something against the 
> wall. He looked at it. It was the broken mind Earaser thingy. "Slag.
> I 
> hope My laptop can pick up a signal." Scopronok opens up his laptop 
> and presses a few button. He then picked up a small signal. He 
walked 
> out. "KitKat, or Stinga(sorry if i misspled it.) I need 1 of you to 
> come with me."
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
>   Sniper slowly went to sleep. He beast mode was slowly recharging 
> him.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Zerlging left the engine room. "Idiots." He then walked up to 
Oinker 
> Statius locked body. Zergling grabs oinker and puts him into a Cr 
> chamber. 
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> BH and BlastRage enter their base. They step into the cr chambers.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Proto is on the scanners of the CF.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Rhinox is on the com unit of the CF.
> 
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Grimmler is on Premiter Patrol of the CF.

> Lobstruck left the rock. He took off toward the East.
